meanings.sent1: The growth was papillomatous in appearance.
meanings.sent2: Her skin had a papillomatous texture.
meanings.sent3: The papillomatous bumps on the tree made it look like a tiny forest.
meanings.sent4: The papillomatous landscape of the coral reef was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The doctor described the wart as papillomatous, like a small cluster of mushrooms.

meanings.definition: Covered with or characterized by papillomas.
meanings.sent1: The papillomatous skin condition caused discomfort.
meanings.sent2: The papillomatous growths on the plant were concerning.
meanings.sent3: The papillomatous patches on the wall looked like tiny mountains.
meanings.sent4: Her papillomatous coat of fur was unique among the litter.
meanings.sent5: The papillomatous texture of the rock felt rough to the touch.
